description: Fixed critical bugs in .julieignore auto-generation and added comprehensive test coverage. Pattern format bug: changed dir/** to dir/ for proper word boundary matching (prevents false positives like matching old-libs/ when we only want libs/). Made dir_to_pattern() pub(crate) for testing. Added 19 comprehensive tests covering: vendor directory detection (libs/, plugins/, vendor/), jQuery/Bootstrap file detection, minified code concentration, path normalization, .julieignore file generation, and full workflow integration. All tests passing. Code compiles cleanly.
